system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.ScZmtSWFJTU4dg9v]{Brawl}

Benefits

When making an unarmed called shot attack, the character receives a +4 bonus to their attack roll and can cause extremity damage with unarmed attacks.

Normal

Unarmed attacks cannot cause extremity damage.

Special

Unarmed called shot attacks fall under normal called shot rules, and the penalties that are associated with them.
system.summary: +4 called shot bonus, deal extremity damage
